upgrades.description: Install tactile warning strips with high color contrast on each stair tread.
upgrades.dimensions: Width: 9.62m (full width of stairs), Depth of strip: 0.05m (5cm)
upgrades.material_preferences: Durable, non-slip rubber or composite with high color contrast (e.g., black on gray, or yellow).
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Provides tactile and visual warning of steps, reducing trip hazards for visually impaired users.

upgrades.description: Apply high-contrast colored strips (paint or tape) to the vertical face of each stair tread (the riser).
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Enhanced visual edge detection on stairs, improving safety for all, especially the visually impaired.

upgrades.description: Extend handrails beyond the top and bottom steps, providing support and indicating the stairway's start/end.
upgrades.dimensions: Extension length: Minimum 0.3m at both ends.
upgrades.material_preferences: Same as existing handrails, or compatible non-slip material.
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Provide advance warning and continuous support to those with visual or mobility impairments.

upgrades.description: Install tactile signage (Braille and raised characters) at the top and bottom of the stairs to indicate floor numbers or destinations.
upgrades.location_reference: Top and bottom landings of existing stairway
upgrades.material_preferences: Durable plastic or metal with raised characters and Braille.
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Wayfinding support for visually impaired individuals.

upgrades.description: Improve visibility of signage by increasing font size, using high-contrast colors, and ensuring adequate lighting.
upgrades.dimensions: Increase signage sizes by at least 25%.
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Enhances signage readability for all, especially those with low vision.

upgrades.description: Install ramps parallel to the stairs, providing accessible entry and exit to all levels, adhering to accessibility standards (e.g., ADA).
upgrades.dimensions: Width: Minimum 1.22m. Length dependent on height, aiming for a 1:12 slope.
upgrades.accessibility_goal: Improve wheelchair and mobility device navigation between levels.
